_header: Her fair speech is turned into grutching
_description: A couplet in Bozon’s Contes moralisés

BLHar1288.Transcription:
hurre fayre speche ys turnyd in to grutchynghere swete smelle and
                    sawowurys turnyd in to stynggyng
